rev.desc.rev.desc: Removed a debug panel that was printing out the query used to select children.
In addition to the changes below, also modified panel adjust.end to use $j variable instead of $i - 1.

Added a new panel increment.only.i to be called from adjust.end & decide.overlap. This new panel will only increment the variable $i instead of $i & $j, which would mess up the total time since some dates/times are skipped.
added call to apm.get.related.query to retrieve the child record list from the deviceparent file instead of the parent field in the device file.
Altered to use pm.number (a character field) instead of number to pass around problem numbers into downtime

descript.descript: Removed a debug panel that was printing out the query used to select children.
In addition to the changes below, also modified panel adjust.end to use $j variable instead of $i - 1.

Added a new panel increment.only.i to be called from adjust.end & decide.overlap. This new panel will only increment the variable $i instead of $i & $j, which would mess up the total time since some dates/times are skipped.
added call to apm.get.related.query to retrieve the child record list from the deviceparent file instead of the parent field in the device file.
Altered to use pm.number (a character field) instead of number to pass around problem numbers into downtime
